content: परिसरः {@--1@} Verge, border, proximity, vicinity, neighbourhood, environs (of a river, mountain, town &c.); गोदावरीपरिसरस्य गिरेरतटानि <ls>U. 3. 8</ls>; परिसरविषयेषु लीढमुक्ताः <ls>Ki. 5. 38.</ls> {@--2@} Position, site. {@--3@} Width, breadth. {@--4@} Death. {@--5@} A rule, precept. {@--6@} A god.
